footer.description: A leading manufacturer of LED displays for any application. Innovative solutions for business, entertainment and advertising.

1.title: Top 10 Benchmark Absen Projects of the First Half of 2024.

1.text: Leading manufacturer of LED displays worldwide, Absen, showed in the first half of 2024 how innovative it can be and how adaptable it can be to market demands by forming strategic alliances with partners. Through these collaborations, various benchmark projects that demonstrated outstanding performance and provided customized solutions for multiple applications—including virtual production, staging&rental, retail, sports, DOOH, etc.—were successfully developed. Let’s go over some of the most thrilling moments from this vibrant period via the lens of those outstanding cases!

2.heading: Trilogy Studios Shapes the New Reality
2.text: At more than 1,100 square meters, this is Absen’s biggest virtual production project to date. Trilogy Studios, UAS-based, upgraded its virtual production studio with Absen’s PR technology. The studio’s LED volume offers pixel pitch resolutions of 1.5mm, 2.5mm, and 5.2mm from Absen’s PR Series and is painstakingly designed for virtual production. It produces outputs that are incredibly lifelike, have exceptional contrast ratios, and have unmatched color integrity. This state-of-the-art setup revolutionizes the production logic of the film and television industries while bringing the real-world shooting environment to life and enabling a realistic portrayal of what occurs on screen.

3.heading: The World’s First Sports Floor Screen
3.text: The FIBA U19 Women’s Basketball World Cup in Spain was celebrated as an extraordinary sporting event, showcasing the pinnacle of athletic talent. A standout feature of this world-class competition was the groundbreaking sports floor screen, created by ASB LumiFlex in collaboration with Absen LED technology. This innovative installation is the world’s first full LED video sports floor constructed from glass, utilizing Absen’s 4.8mm pixel pitch products. It has redefined the concept of sports flooring, elevating it to an unprecedented level. This event marked the beginning of numerous other high-profile events, including the NBA All-Star Weekend 2024 and the Basketball Champions League Final Four 2024.

2.title: Guinness World Record at Qatar Expo Powered by Absen LED Screens.

1.text: At the recent Qatar Expo, a remarkable achievement was celebrated as the event set a new Guinness World Record. This prestigious accolade was made possible through the innovative use of Absen’s state-of-the-art LED display technology. The project, conceived and coordinated by Cityneon, showcased the unparalleled capabilities of Absen’s LED screens, marking a significant milestone in the world of visual displays.Bringing the latest ground-breaking technological advances in a variety of fields, the Qatar Expo is a prestigious international event that draws global attention. Absen’s participation in this event, facilitated by Cityneon, underscores the importance of collaboration in attaining excellence, with the creation of an engaging visual spectacle that brought about a feast for the eyes of visitors. The event, themed “Green Desert, Better Environment,” highlighted significant strides in environmental sustainability and technological innovation. Notably, the Saudi pavilion at the International Horticultural Expo, which ran from 2 October 2023 to 28 March 2024 in Doha, featured an array of 435 external LED columns by Absen, earning a Guinness World Record. Several other prestigious awards were also awarded to this pavilion for its conceptual design, interior architecture, and landscape design.There is no doubt that the Qatar Expo is an important platform that influences global trends and innovations. It brings together thought leaders, industry experts, and cutting-edge technologies from around the world while serving as a melting pot for ideas and showcasing the future of various industries. Absen’s participation in such a high-profile event demonstrates the company’s dedication to being at the forefront of technological advancements and its capability to deliver world-class solutions.

2.heading: Innovative Excellence: The Absen PL V2 Series
2.text: Absen’s exceptional PL V2 Series LED screens played a key role in its success at the Qatar Expo. These screens are renowned for their lightweight and versatile design, high refresh rate, and superior image quality. The PL V2 Series incorporates UltraBlack Technology, which significantly reduces light reflection and enhances contrast, making images more vivid and lifelike. After several discussions with multiple companies, Cityneon, the client behind the installation, eventually chose Absen for its proven track record of delivering high-quality, reliable LED solutions on time. In an interview, Dragan Mitrovic, AVL Specialist at Cityneon’s Events Department, expressed the importance of the innovative edge and timely delivery of Absen’s products and services in affecting the company’s decision. “Timing in that moment was our biggest challenge,” said Mitrovic, expressing satisfaction with Absen’s three-month delivery period. Additionally, he has emphasized the exceptional design and features of the PL V2 Series. With pixel pitches ranging from 1.9mm to 4.8mm and brightness levels up to 4500 nits, these screens provide unparalleled clarity and performance in both indoor and outdoor settings. User-friendly functions include automatic edge protection, reliable lock systems, modular maintenance, and magnet-assisted assembly for easy installation. Its flexible mounting options, including curved displays and mixed connections, make the PL V2 Series adaptable and ideal for diverse applications. A Guinness World Record is undoubtedly a big achievement. While the specific details of the record are not the focal point, the recognition itself speaks volumes about the impact and quality of Absen’s LED displays. This accolade places Absen among the elite in the industry, reinforcing its reputation as a leader in innovation and excellence. The record serves as a benchmark for future projects, inspiring confidence in clients and partners worldwide. By demonstrating Absen’s ability to create visually compelling solutions that resonate around the globe, this accomplishment is indicative of the transformative power of innovative technology, which not only enhances its brand image, but also sets new industry standards.

3.text: Looking ahead, Absen is poised to continue its journey of innovation and excellence. To remain at the cutting edge of LED technology, the company is committed to advancing its product offerings and service capabilities. We strive to bring more unforgettable experiences to the world and achieve greater milestones in the future by pushing the limits of what’s possible.

3.title: Highest Credit Rating! Absen Successfully Passed the Extended AEO Customs Certification Audit.

1.text: Absen has passed the Customs AEO Advanced Certification Audit. This marks the second time Absen has successfully passed the AEO certification audit, following its achievement as the first enterprise in the industry to receive AEO Certification Audit in 2016. This accomplishment underscores Absen’s leading position in international trade, particularly in terms of credit status, compliance, and security management.

2.text: The AEO system, endorsed by the World Customs Organization, is a certification system that offers facilitation measures to enterprises with high credit status, corporate compliance, and security levels. Enterprises with AEO Advanced Certificationhave the highest credit rating assessed by China Customs. They also benefit from a series of preferential measures in import and export, such as priority processing, reduced supervision, lower customs clearance costs, shortened processing times, and optimized services. On the international stage, China has signed mutual recognition agreements with Singapore, the European Union, New Zealand, and others. Enterprises with AEO Advanced Certification can enjoy benefits in 28 economies and 54 countries (regions) worldwide.

3.text: As one of the first LED display enterprises to export products overseas, Absen has been expanding its international business since 2005. Over time, it has established a distinctive influence as a leading Chinese LED brand with a leading export volume. In 2016, Absen received the first China AEO certificate issued by China Customs in the LED industry, effectively enhancing its competitiveness in the international market. During the audit process, the Shenzhen Customs AEO Certification Team conducted a comprehensive and detailed assessment of Absen’s Shenzhen Headquarters and Dongjiang Intelligent Manufacturing Center, focusing on internal controls, financial status, compliance, and trade security. Absen passed the audit after the on-site inspection confirmed that it has a sound internal process system and meets all audit standards. Passing the AEO Advanced Certification audit demonstrates Absen’s comprehensive strength in compliance and international trade management. It also provides strong support for expanding Absen’s presence in the global market. With its ongoing global expansion and steadily increasing market share, Absen looks forward to collaborating with partners from diverse backgrounds to create more mutually beneficial opportunities and promote the high-quality development of Chinese brands internationally.
